title: [Connection] Reconnection to chat.
body:
This has been happening to me a lot and it's starting to bug me about it. I already talked to my IP and they said it was nothing wrong on their end.
1. I start up que get into champion select pick the champion I wish to play then it goes into ban phase.
2. Last person in the ban phase is choosing their ban.
3. Randomly I disconnect from chat my internet is up still and working fine.
4. I reconnect to chat but it still says they have 0 seconds to ban and no ban comes up.
5. I can't lock in or choose a champion so I auto dodge and have to wait 5 minute to 30 minutes due to the dodge (It happens probably twice a day or more).
I just want to put this on the boards to see if anyone else has this problem and knows a solution or if someone from riot can help me fix this problem.

replies.body: In a general sense, this just indicates that you're disconnecting from champ select.  I'd recommend checking out our [Connection Troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article which has fixes to the most common causes of connection issues we see.  Let me know if it helps!
Ah I think I see what the problem is. My ISP is Windstream and that's the one on your ISP watch list so I'll see if I can contact my ISP and see what they can do about it if anything.
